description:
Only Adrian Smith part adjusted with the following fixes and or small adjustments:

Measure 24: Made the hammer/pull-off easier to play
Measure 40: Replaced the E note on the A string for the same note on the D string
Measure 71: Fixed small mistake, makes it easier to play
Measure 80: replaced with same note, on A string
Measure 84: replaced with same note, on A string
Measure 88:replaced with same note, on A string
Measure 92: replaced with same note, on D string
Measure 100: replaced with same note, on A string
Measure 119 -> 114:Added pull off on G string, added pull from A to E string. Repeats through bridge Fig. 7

Other fixes may or may not follow in a near future :)

Creds for adjustments: Peter KB
title: Hallowed Be Thy Name
